patthana19.2:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:1.1_1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:1.1_2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:2.1_0: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:2.1_1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:2.1_2: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:3.1_0: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:3.1_1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:3.1_2: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.2:4.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
